comments.body: Add a test case for testing the default covers `\r`, `\r\n` and `\n`?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -268,6 +268,8 @@ final class DataStreamReader private[sql](sparkSession: SparkSession) extends Lo * `java.text.SimpleDateFormat`. This applies to timestamp type. *
  • `multiLine` (default `false`): parse one record, which may span multiple lines, * per file
    • + *
  • `lineSep` (default covers all `\r`, `\r\n` and `\n`): defines the line separator
